name: Automated Client Success Management
description: AI-driven client success and retention automation

steps.manus_prompt: Analyze client health metrics including usage, engagement, satisfaction, and success indicators.
steps.expected_output: Client health score and risk assessment

steps.manus_prompt: Create personalized success plan based on client goals, current status, and growth opportunities.
Generate proactive communication based on client status, achievements, and upcoming opportunities.
Identify upselling and cross-selling opportunities based on client usage and business growth.
Develop retention strategy for at-risk clients including intervention plans and value reinforcement.
